## VectorBuilder.fromIndexFunction() method

Constructs a vector with entries given by \_entry = f(i)\_ where \_f\_ is `valueFromIndex` and `i` is the index of the element

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fromIndexFunction(dimension: number, valueFromIndex: VectorIndexFunction<S>): V;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  dimension | <code>number</code> | The dimension of the vector to generate |
|  valueFromIndex | <code>VectorIndexFunction&lt;S&gt;</code> | A function returning the entry for a given index |

<b>Returns:</b>

`V`

The new vector

## Example


```
vectorBuilder.fromIndexFunction(4, i => i + 3); // [ 3 4 5 6 ]

```
